title: Norman Himes
text:
Norman Lawrence "Normie" Himes (April 13, 1900 – September 14, 1958) was a Canadian <a href="ice%20hockey">ice hockey</a> player and professional golfer. Himes played 402 games in the <a href="National%20Hockey%20League">National Hockey League</a>. He played for the <a href="New%20York%20Americans">New York Americans</a>.
After retiring from hockey Himes became a professional <a href="golf">golf</a>er, for the most part at Westmount Golf Club in <a href="Kitchener%2C%20Ontario">Kitchener, Ontario</a>. His biggest tournament win as a professional was the Ontario PGA Match Play for the Millar Trophy in 1951.
